Taunting Barb.name: Taunting Barb
Taunting Barb.flavor: Your taunt is as keen as the blade you thrust into your foe.
Taunting Barb.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Taunting Barb.onHit: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you pull the target to a square adjacent to you and make a melee secondary attack against the target. You have combat advantage for the attack.
